sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_csm_doctemplate.CSDocumentTemplateDAO</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>CSDocumentTemplateDAO</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var CSDocumentTemplateDAO = Class.create();
CSDocumentTemplateDAO.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },
	
	getTableRecord:function(tableName, sysId){
		if(!gs.nil(tableName) && !gs.nil(sysId)){
			var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
			gr.get(sysId);
			if(gr.isValidRecord() && gr.canRead())
				return gr;
		}
	},
	
	getTableRecords:function(tableName, sysIds){
		if(!gs.nil(tableName) && !gs.nil(sysIds)){
			var gr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
			gr.initialize();
			gr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', sysIds);
			gr.query();
			return gr;
		}
	},
	
	getAttachmentRecord:function(sysId){
		if(!gs.nil(sysId)){
			var gr = new GlideRecord(CSDocumentTemplateConstants.SYS_ATTACHMENT_TABLE);
			gr.get(sysId);
			if(gr.isValidRecord() && gr.canRead())
				return gr;
		}
	},
	
	getAttachmentRecordByQuery:function(tableName, sysId, fileName, isPartialName){
		if(!gs.nil(tableName) && !gs.nil(sysId) && !gs.nil(fileName)){
			var gr = new GlideRecord(CSDocumentTemplateConstants.SYS_ATTACHMENT_TABLE);
			gr.addQuery('table_sys_id', sysId);
			gr.addQuery('table_name', tableName);
			if(!isPartialName)
				gr.addQuery('file_name', fileName);
			else
				gr.addQuery('file_name','STARTSWITH',fileName);
			gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
			gr.setLimit(1);
			gr.query();
			if(gr.next() && (gr.canRead() || sysId == '-1')){
				return gr;
			}
		}
	},
	
	getDocumentTemplateRecord:function(sysId){
		if(!gs.nil(sysId)){
			var gr = new GlideRecord(CSDocumentTemplateConstants.DOCUMENT_TEMPLATE_TABLE);
			gr.get(sysId);
			if(gr.isValidRecord() && gr.canRead())
				return gr;
		}
	},

    type: 'CSDocumentTemplateDAO'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-03-31 18:52:34</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>0789ce9d53ac3300acb8ddeeff7b121d</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>CSDocumentTemplateDAO</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Customer Service Document Template" source="sn_csm_doctemplate">640af3d073232300f74071ef64f6a7f6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy>read</sys_policy>
        <sys_scope display_value="Customer Service Document Template">640af3d073232300f74071ef64f6a7f6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0789ce9d53ac3300acb8ddeeff7b121d</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-08-06 10:16:05</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
